description: Incremental tweak from iter 10: slightly higher liquidity buffer for both banks to reduce any hidden overdraft risk while keeping simple urgency-first release logic and fixed collateral posting.

on_true.description: Always release urgent or overdue payments to avoid deadline-related costs.
Release when there is enough liquidity with buffer.

on_false.description: Hold payment when not urgent and liquidity is insufficient.
For non-urgent payments, only release when effective liquidity covers remaining amount times liquidity_buffer.

payment_tree.description: Release if payment is urgent or past deadline; otherwise check liquidity vs remaining amount with buffer.

bank_tree.description: No additional bank-level state or release budget logic in this simple policy.

on_true.description: Post initial collateral based on configured fraction of capacity.

on_false.description: Do not adjust collateral intraday in this simple strategy.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Post a fixed fraction of max collateral capacity at start of day; otherwise hold collateral decisions intraday.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Keep collateral position unchanged at end of each tick/day.
